TopicTitle: What should I do with the numerous surface bases on a Celestial Body once the contract is completed?

Articles.Content: I am playing KSP 1.8.1 with the Beyond Home planet pack, and I have 4 surface bases on the surface of one of the moons of the home planet Rhode. What do I do with all these surface bases? What do you do with all of your extra bases?

why not leave them there? there's not much else to do with them.

i stopped playing career after i got to the point where there was no challenge, so i basically stopped playing with the stuff i don't need
Dismantle them with KIS/KAS and take them back to Rhode for a refund; delete them from the tracking station; abandon them and never look at them again... If you don’t need it, why keep it?

Well, if you can't figure out a use by yourself you probably don't need it. If that is the case, leaving it alone or terminating is as good as anything . If you keep it they may eventually unlock contract to expand the stations, if you terminate the game don't need to keep track of it.

Otherwise, the parts are functional, drill can get ore, labs can do research and so on.  If your mods allow that , the can also be rearranged or recycled.
